section.title: Introduction
section.para: Tree is a generic thing, a "must have" of any widget collection. Unfortunately, javacript toolkit should be lightweight, so I couldn't take a Swing tree component and simply copy it. Almost all components are optional and event-based, feel free to hook on whatever you'd like.

Basic things are shown in tests, so you might want to check them first and copy-paste exactly the things you need. The tutorial is meant to provide deeper understanding for those who want to extend/modify tree behavior.
